# Government Tender Announcement for Temporary Help Services

## Title:
National Capital Region (NCR) - One (1) Special Advisor, Temporary Help Services under Supply Arrangement for the NCR

## Overview:
The Department of National Defense (DND) has a requirement for Temporary Help Services and has issued a Request for Proposal to suppliers who are qualified under the streams and categories listed below. This requirement is open only to those supply arrangement holders under reference EN578-172870.

## Description:
The DND requires a Special Advisor, Temporary Help Services, to support various projects and initiatives within the NCR. This position involves providing expert advice and support to Department staff on a temporary basis.

## Key Requirements:

* Level of Security Requirement: NATO Secret & Top Secret
* Location: National Capital Region (NCR)
* Eligibility: Suppliers under EN578-172870 who are qualified under the streams and categories of Special Advisor

## Invitation to Participate:

A select group of suppliers has been invited to submit a proposal, including:

* 8513929 Canada Inc.
* ADGA Group Consultants Inc.
* ADRM Technology Consulting Group Corp.
* Calian Ltd.
* Coradix technology Consulting Ltd.
* DBHS Security Consulting Inc
* DLS Technology Corporation
* Modis Canada Inc
* Pricewaterhouse Coopers LLP
* RHEA INC.
* SoftSim Technologies Inc.
* Solutions LDC Inc.
* Thinkpoint Inc.
* TRM Technologies Inc.
* Veritaaq Technology House Inc.

## How to Participate:
Interested suppliers can access the Request for Proposal document on the Canada Buys website, https://canadabuys.canada.ca/, under reference number S4420585. Proposals must be submitted by the closing date of 2023-05-18T13:00:00 to be considered.
